articles.title: Lung cancer: Liquid biopsies could speed up treatment - BBC
articles.description: Liquid biopsies could replace the need for invasive procedures under general anaesthetic.
articles.content:
A new blood test could dramatically speed up lung cancer treatment in Wales. 
Liquid biopsies would remove the need for patients to have uncomfortable tissue biopsies under general anaesthetic.
